{{Wireless embedded system |brand=widemac |model=SL-R7206 |revision=(XDX-RN502R) |est_release_date=05/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=travel router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050F |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:B0:C0 |oui_eth=00:B0:C0 }} {{TagLine|Wireless N150 AP/3G Travel Router}} :[https://web.archive.org/web/20160806201540/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=135 Product page] (WD-R7206)
"XDX-RN502R V2.0" is silkscreened on the board.
The manufacturer of this device appears to be '''widemac''' :[http://sztianhao.com Shenzhen Century Xinyang Technology Co., Ltd]
===Rebrands and similar products=== *'''Bococom DWR-150''' - Wireless 3G Mobile Router ([https://www.flickr.com/photos/elecnix/sets/72157629696033799/with/6881210254/ internal images]) *'''CD-R King CW-G3''' - Wireless N150 Access Point/3G Mobile Router *'''SkyLink SL-R7206''' (Widemac) - Wireless N150 AP/3G Travel Router *'''Model C1291''' - Portable Mini 150M 802.11n WiFi Wireless 3G Router *'''TopLink RT-3GWT''' - Wireless N Access Point/3G Travel Mobile Router
===Additional external links=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=36463 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=297480#p297480 ''3G Router - RT3050F'' (XDX-RN502H V7.0)] *[https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ On the '''Reseau Libre''' wiki] :[[SkyLink SL-R7205 (XDX-RN502J)]] (Widemac) :[[SkyLink SL-R7206 (XDX-RN502R)]] (Widemac) *[http://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/Bococom-DWR150/ ''Bococom DWR-150'' on the '''Montreal Mesh''' wiki] :[http://www.bococom.com/ Shenzhen Bococom Technology] DWR-150
